features: DERMACARE ANTI DANDRUFF SHAMPOO: Dove Dermacare Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo cleanses to leave hair flake free* *no visible flakes with regular use
SHAMPOO FOR ITCHY SCALP: Dove Dermacare Anti-Dandruff Shampoo works as a dry scalp treatment to hydrate and sooth a dry and itchy scalp
HAIR CARE FOR SCALP RELIEF: This scalp shampoo cleanses and nourishes to reduce scalp redness and relief itchiness
FRAGRANT DANDRUFF TREATMENT: This anti-dandruff shampoo delivers the fragrant and indulgent aroma of coconut and shea butter
PH BALANCED HAIR PRODUCTS: Dove Dermacare Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo has a pH balanced dry scalp shampoo formula
DANDRUFF SHAMPOO FOR FRIZZ CONTROL: Besides tackling flakes, this anti-dandruff shampoo smooths strands for less frizzy hair
body.description: Sometimes little flakes on the shoulders can make us feel self-conscious, sending us looking for anti-dandruff hair care products. But did you know that aggressive washing and harsh products could take away your scalp’s nutrients and hair’s moisture balance, making it dry and dull? Enter Dove Dryness and Itch Relief Shampoo, which is specifically designed to help nourish the dry scalp and relieve it from itchy irritation. The mild formula gently cares for a dry scalp, while the indulgent coconut and shea butter scent gives a luxurious feel. Dove Dryness & Itch Relief Shampoo is formulated with active Pyrithione Zinc to effectively tackle dandruff, and to help solve dryness and itch experienced by dandruff-prone scalp. Its mild, pH balanced formula helps to gently care for hair. The mild anti dandruff shampoo formula cleanses itchy and dry scalp while leaving hair flake free*, smooth and less frizzy. How to use: Apply this dry scalp treatment shampoo to wet hair, enjoying the indulgent coconut and shea butter scent, and gently massage away a dry and itchy scalp before rinsing well. For the best results, use alongside Dove Dryness and Itch Relief Conditioner to help nourish your scalp and relieve itchiness and irritation. Say goodbye to standard anti-dandruff shampoo and other dandruff treatments with this hair shampoo for dry hair and scalps. *no visible flakes with regular use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove DermaCare Scalp Series Dry and Itch Relief Shampoo is specifically designed to help nourish dry scalp and relieve it from itchy irritation. This itchy and dry scalp shampoo is formulated with active Pyrithione Zinc to effectively tackle dandruff in a formula to help solve dryness and itch experienced by dandruff-prone scalp.

Dove DermaCare Scalp Series Formulated with Pyrithione Zinc and Nutrium Care, Dove DermaCare Series uses a pH balanced formula to give you dandruff-free, nourished hair. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Dryness & Itch Relief Designed to calm scalp itchiness and dryness, this anti-dandruff system is formulated to help eliminate visible flakes with regular use. Dove Care Goes Beyond Your Hair This Dove hair product is PETA cruelty-free. We are also on a journey to have all our bottles made with 100% reusable plastic.

Dove DermaCare Anti-Dandruff Dryness & Itchiness Conditioner Dove DermaCare Scalp Coconut and Hydration Anti-Dandruff Shampoo Dove DermaCare Scalp Coconut and Hydration Anti-Dandruff Conditioner Main Benefit This conditioner is formulated with active Pyrithione Zinc to effectively tackle dandruff and help solve dryness & itch. Crafted with coconut & sweet lime, this refreshing anti-dandruff formula will leave hair feeling soft and nourished, and smelling great. Give your scalp a boost of hydration with this nourishing anti-dandruff conditioner designed to give you flake-free and healthy hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not like other anti dandruff shampoos.Has a great smell. It’s somewhat heavy but not too bad. Works like a charm!! My skin gets so dry & itchy at the first sign of cold weather& as soon as I started using this, no more itch!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Calms the scalp down and keeps the itching under control.
reviews.reviewText: Makes a good lather and rinses out nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality value itchy scalp.
reviews.reviewText: This has been a wonderful product. My hair is shiny, clean, and controlled without being greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was good 👍
reviews.reviewText: I have a seasonal dry scalp. My scalp is usually oily but in the winter I lose hair and my scalp becomes dry. I don't have dandruff or Lice so it's rlly confusing. This product didn't surprise but gave me some comfort. Its an alright shampoo but the thing that pleased me the most was the scent.The smell was just so calming and kept my scalp fresh for 2-3 days.The bottle is good sizing and probably gonna last a while. I didn't lose that much hair which this product. I might not repurchase but overall I found this product okay. TELL ME IF YOU FOUND THIS HELPFUL 🙏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm Impressed (and that ain't easy)
reviews.reviewText: I bet I've tried every non-itch shampoo on the planet. Pricey ones. Salon ones. Mail order ones. Drug store ones. They've all wound-up in the trash because they could not stop my scalp from itching. It's particularly annoying because I don't have dandruff (or bugs). Anyway, I found this on the Amazon, read some reviews and because it wasn't another expensive bottle (that was probably going to wind up in the trash), I tried it. Glad I did. It's not only a great price, but smells good and has cut itching my head by, I bet, 75-80%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars didn't work for me
reviews.reviewText: don't have dandruff but do have some itchy patches om my scalp that just won't go away. Always looking for a shampoo that helps with the itch. So far, haven't found one. This one is a nice shampoo, gives me lots of volume, but doesn't help much with the itching. Price is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and works well!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter had dry scalp and some flakes from isotretenoin use. Other dandruff shampoo did not smell good-this smells good and works!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works for my dandruff
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect this to work but it did. I have used this twice and there is less dandruff. Finally! Previously, I tried Nizoral dandruff shampoo and the preshampoo, Pacifica Rosemary Apple Cider Detox Tonic and the Kristin Ess clarifying shampoo.But this has stopped most of the itching and I can see less dandruff. Hopefully, after some time, it will eliminate it.

This shampoo solve all my hair problems...life long problems are solved by this shampoo.And this is a myth that a shampoo can only for cleansing of hair... From first wash i saw the result........ My hair fall & dandruff reduced.....Thank you so much Dr. Nivedita Dadu.... 😊

Have been using this shampoo for awhile now. A gentle shampoo that helps to get rid of my dandruff and this shampoo smells great because of the Shea Butter too (unlike those artificial fragrance kind).
2 cello tape on shampoo cap instead on proper seal.Will update after usage.
Reduces the itchiness. only con is that 2k price is overpriced.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not good and most importantly not returnable.
reviews.reviewText: The first thing is not returnable, and the price is too high.
